name: Long Term Stock Exchange
headline: LTSE is an ecosystem for visionary business.
description:
LTSE partners with companies across their lifecycle to help them grow and scale from formation through IPO. The Long-Term Stock Exchange (LTSE) is an SEC-regulated national securities exchange designed to align great companies and long-term investors with the shared goal of value creation. They have assembled a world-class team of experts and advisors with deep expertise in finance, regulation, law, and technology.

At every stage, from private investment into the public markets, strategically managing equity and a company's cap table has an outsized impact on long-term success. So in addition to the exchange, LTSE also built LTSE Equity, a full-lifecycle cap table management solution for planning, managing, and collaborating on startup equity.

Eric Ries, an entrepreneur and author of the New York Times bestseller, The Lean Startup, is the founder of the LTSE. Eric is the creator of the Lean Startup methodology, a global movement and management philosophy practiced by companies large and small. He founded a number of startups, including IMVU, where he served as CTO, and has advised on business and product strategy for startups, venture capital firms, and large companies, including GE, partnering with them on the FastWorks program.

# An Ecosystem ofLeaders' Leaders 
The Long-Term Stock Exchange is the business ecosystem helping visionary companies at all stages drive long-term profit with purpose.
[Learn About Our Mission ](http://ltse.com/</about/mission>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6462417e8db99f8baa069524/6481e6326eb100d5bcce8962_newhomeheroill.webp)

## Succeed today and long into the future with LTSE
Look beyond short-term results. Achieve your vision for long-term impact with comprehensive services, guidance and resources designed to help your business thrive — regardless of size or stage.
### A Stock Exchange championing businesses with impact
[Listings![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64653909e115e4ac4b5722f2/646c7400f036a2e7437bff1b_Bottom%20Triangle.svg)](http://ltse.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[Trading![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64653909e115e4ac4b5722f2/646c7400f036a2e7437bff1b_Bottom%20Triangle.svg)](http://ltse.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)
**Public listings that reward purpose-driven leadership**
Join next-generation companies committed to principled profitability.
[Explore Listings](http://ltse.com/</listings/partner-with-ltse>)
Trade on a principles-based exchange
Trade on an exchange that values long-term stability with governance principles focused on long-term investing.
[Explore Trading](http://ltse.com/</trading/why-trade>)
pRINCIPLES THAT SET VISIONARY COMPANIES APART
### A revolutionary set of 5 SEC-approved principles
Our long-term-focused principles are what differentiate the Long-Term Stock Exchange from all other listing or trading venues. They provide the framework for your company to build a set of standards and policies that reflect who you are and how you want to be viewed by the world. Filed with and approved by the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC), these principles reflect innovative corporate governance, and drive a long-term focus.
[View our Listing Standards](http://ltse.com/</listings/listing-standards>)
##### Principle 1: Stakeholders
Long-term focused companies should consider a broader group of stakeholders and the critical role they play in one another’s success.
##### Principle 2: Strategy
Long-term focused companies should measure success in years and decades and prioritize long-term decision making.
##### Principle 3: Compensation
Long-term focused companies should align executive compensation and board compensation with long-term performance.
##### Principle 4: Governance
Boards of directors of long-term focused companies should be engaged in and have explicit oversight of long-term strategy.
##### Principle 5: Investors
Long-term focused companies should engage with their long-term shareholders.
Updated capabilities
## Say hello to the new Long-Term Stock Exchange trading platform
Trade on a principles-based exchange
#### A market model and technology platform designed to provide a reliable, efficient, and simple experience.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6462417e8db99f8baa069524/66ec435aca2dde10f149b04c_Group%2010128984.png)
##### Robust Trading Experience
New LTSE order types, expanded order management capabilities, and robust risk controls to enhance the overall trading experience on LTSE.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6462417e8db99f8baa069524/66ec43314dbd9acadd69427d_Group%2010128991.svg)
##### Resilient Technology
Optimized trading platform that ensures seamless member connectivity across all environments that are tuned for consistent performance across any type of trading event, from heavy sustained loads to peak utilization during micro-bursts.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6462417e8db99f8baa069524/66ec43328458fe6e12a4ea04_Group%2010128992.svg)
##### Simple Fee Structure
Transparent fee schedule that provides participants with a straightforward view of connectivity, trading, and market data costs throughout the month.
[Explore Trading](http://ltse.com/</trading/why-trade>)
### We believe business is destined for better
Today, business leaders are forced to prioritize short-term gains over lasting value. At LTSE, we’re building a world where businesses are supported to create long-term prosperity and lasting impact.
[Learn About Our Mission](http://ltse.com/</about/mission>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6462417e8db99f8baa069524/6481f1c7229b1faa2058c81a_Illustration%20with%20background.png)

##### LTSE’s founding investors
LTSE is backed by a distinguished group of investors including globally recognized and mission-aligned blue-chip investors.

### Partnerships built on results
LTSE CASE STUDIES
![⟨33⟩](http://ltse.com/<https:/ltse.com/asana-infographic>)![⟨34⟩](http://ltse.com/<https:/ltse.com/thredup-infographic>)
an ecosystem for long-term success
## Succeed today and long into the future with LTSE
Look beyond short-term results. Achieve your vision for long-term impact with comprehensive services, guidance and resources designed to help your business thrive — regardless of size or stage.
### A Stock Exchange championing businesses with impact
Listings![⟨35⟩](http://ltse.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)Trading![⟨35⟩](http://ltse.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)
**Public listings that reward purpose-driven leadership**
Join next-generation companies committed to principled profitability.
Explore Listings⟨4⟩
Trade on a principles-based exchange
Trade on an exchange that values long-term stability with governance principles focused on long-term investing.
Explore Trading⟨10⟩
pRINCIPLES THAT SET VISIONARY COMPANIES APART
### A revolutionary set of 5 SEC-approved principles
Our long-term-focused principles are what differentiate the Long-Term Stock Exchange from all other listing or trading venues. They provide the framework for your company to build a set of standards and policies that reflect who you are and how you want to be viewed by the world. Filed with and approved by the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC), these principles reflect innovative corporate governance, and drive a long-term focus.
View our Listing Standards⟨6⟩
##### Principle 1: Stakeholders
Long-term focused companies should consider a broader group of stakeholders and the critical role they play in one another’s success.
##### Principle 2: Strategy
Long-term focused companies should measure success in years and decades and prioritize long-term decision making.
##### Principle 3: Compensation
Long-term focused companies should align executive compensation and board compensation with long-term performance.
##### Principle 4: Governance
Boards of directors of long-term focused companies should be engaged in and have explicit oversight of long-term strategy.
##### Principle 5: Investors
Long-term focused companies should engage with their long-term shareholders.
Updated capabilities
## Say hello to the new Long-Term Stock Exchange trading platform
Trade on a principles-based exchange
#### A market model and technology platform designed to provide a reliable, efficient, and simple experience.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6462417e8db99f8baa069524/66ec435aca2dde10f149b04c_Group%2010128984.png)
##### Robust Trading Experience
New LTSE order types, expanded order management capabilities, and robust risk controls to enhance the overall trading experience on LTSE.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6462417e8db99f8baa069524/66ec43314dbd9acadd69427d_Group%2010128991.svg)
##### Resilient Technology
Optimized trading platform that ensures seamless member connectivity across all environments that are tuned for consistent performance across any type of trading event, from heavy sustained loads to peak utilization during micro-bursts.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6462417e8db99f8baa069524/66ec43328458fe6e12a4ea04_Group%2010128992.svg)
##### Simple Fee Structure
Transparent fee schedule that provides participants with a straightforward view of connectivity, trading, and market data costs throughout the month.
Explore Trading⟨10⟩
### We believe business is destined for better
Today, business leaders are forced to prioritize short-term gains over lasting value. At LTSE, we’re building a world where businesses are supported to create long-term prosperity and lasting impact.
Learn About Our Mission⟨3⟩

generated_description:
The Long-Term Stock Exchange (LTSE) was founded in 2012 by Eric Ries, a notable entrepreneur and author known for his influential book, *The Lean Startup*. Headquartered in San Francisco and part of Y Combinator's Batch S17, LTSE operates as an SEC-regulated national securities exchange dedicated to fostering long-term growth for companies and their investors. 

At the core of LTSE's mission is its commitment to creating an ecosystem where visionary businesses can thrive. This involves supporting companies throughout their lifecycle—from initial formation to going public via an IPO. The LTSE not only facilitates this growth through its trading platform but also offers LTSE Equity, a cap table management solution that helps startups strategically manage their equity and financial structure.

One of the unique aspects of LTSE is its focus on long-term value creation, diverging from the short-term profit mentality pervasive in many aspects of today's financial markets. LTSE has put forth five SEC-approved principles guiding companies to measure success over years, align compensation with long-term performance, and actively engage with long-term shareholders. This framework encourages a deeper stakeholder engagement and governance practices aimed at sustainable success.

With a team of 68 employees and backed by prominent investors, including Andreessen Horowitz and Greylock Partners, LTSE positions itself as a valuable partner for companies striving for principled profitability. Their trading platform emphasizes efficiency, reliability, and a straightforward fee structure tailored for long-term investment strategies.

For those looking to understand more or see if their business could benefit from what LTSE has to offer, you can visit their website at [ltse.com](http://ltse.com). In a world increasingly distracted by fleeting metrics, LTSE is making a case for a return to what truly matters—building enduring, impactful businesses.
